title: Enhancing Self-Regulated Learning Competencies Using Generative AI and Personality Traits

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with generative AI and understanding of self-regulated learning concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on workplace relevance for current practitioners, optimized for smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can implement at least three self-regulated learning strategies—including goal-setting, execution, and reflection—using generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT).
Learners can select and apply AI-based learning strategies suited to their personality traits (e.g., openness, conscientiousness).
Learners can review and improve learning outcomes using generative AI on a weekly basis in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
